org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication

Class ExceptionMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
      • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.ExceptionMessage

  • public class ExceptionMessage
extends Message
    The server sends this message to a player who caused an exception on the server side. It will allow the player to track down the error.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli
